data.title: Fortinet Wins Prestigious 2024 Red Dot Product Design Award
data.meta_description: FortiGate Rugged 70G with Dual 5G Modems next-generation firewall wins 2024 Red Dot Design Award. Read more.
data.text:
We’re excited to announce that Fortinet has received the prestigious Red Dot Product Design Award for our FortiGate Rugged 70G with Dual 5G Modems next-generation firewall (NGFW). This award recognizes products with exceptional design and underscores Fortinet’s commitment to excellence in product engineering that enables its industry-leading technology to support even the most space-constrained and extreme operational technology (OT) environments.

Fortinet is the only cybersecurity company to receive this award for an industrial NGFW. This feature-packed appliance includes industry-leading, high-performance threat protection and the added functionality of dual 5G modems to enable high-availability for mission-critical networks. It is designed to operate in environments subject to extreme temperatures, dust, vibration, and shock to support industrial locations and protect critical manufacturing and infrastructure from cyber threats. At the same time, its compact DIN-rail mount and fan-less design provide an intricate balance of industrial design and security functionality.

FortiGate NGFWs are specially designed to converge networking and security with unified management to simplify cybersecurity for OT infrastructure and enable secure connectivity to enterprise IT and wide-area networks. They deliver enhanced secure networking capabilities, high availability 5G connectivity, and private 5G integration for OT environments while supporting OT-specific applications and communication protocols.

Backed by the latest fifth-generation Fortinet security processing unit, the FortiGate Rugged 70G with Dual 5G Modems leverages FortiGuard AI-Powered Security Services and delivers high availability through dual 5G cellular modems. Designed to operate in remote environments, this rugged appliance is packed with cybersecurity features that can securely connect everything from electrical substations to autonomous fleets.

All FortiGate Rugged NGFWs run on the FortiOS operating system. FortiOS supports comprehensive critical security and networking functions—including OT-specific features—enabling it to serve as the foundation of the Fortinet Security Fabric. As an OT Security Platform, they are uniquely able to meet the demands of a wide range of industrial applications and protocols, supporting more than 80 industrial protocols to secure critical infrastructure in many industries. The FortiGate Rugged 70G with Dual 5G Modems combines these features with a compact design, rugged features, and high availability for extreme industrial networking environments.

About the Red Dot Award

Every year, the Red Dot Award for Product Design honors products with exceptionally high design quality. The award is based on the decision of the Red Dot jury, which assesses submissions based on the four basic principles of good design: the quality of function, the quality of seduction, the quality of use, and the quality of responsibility. The 2024 Red Dot jury comprises 39 experts from 20 countries on four continents. Entries from 60 countries were tested and evaluated by the jurors across 51 product categories, including computer and information technology. Past winners include Apple, Ferrari, Logitech, Thule, and other world-renowned brands.

Recognition of Innovation

This latest recognition from the Red Dot Design Award is a testament to Fortinet’s history of—and commitment to—design innovation. With over 1,300 global patents (and counting), Fortinet has more than twice as many patents as comparable cybersecurity companies. And as a leading vendor in the cybersecurity industry, Fortinet secures over 755,000 of the largest enterprises, OT networks, critical infrastructure, service providers, and government organizations worldwide. Enterprises depend on Fortinet, with over 70 percent of Fortune 100 companies and nearly 70 percent of Global 2000 companies using Fortinet security products.

Fortinet continually earns leadership positions across dozens of industry analyst reports, with over 100 analyst reports validating Fortinet across networking and security. Fortinet has also been acknowledged in eight separate Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ reports, including for network firewall, SD-WAN, single-vendor SASE, SSE, enterprise wired and wireless LAN, security information and event management (SIEM), endpoint protection platform, and access management*. We believe this continued recognition is a testament to our unique approach of converging networking and security through a single operating system (FortiOS) and cybersecurity platform (the Security Fabric).

Learn more about the Fortinet portfolio of rugged FortiGate NGFWs.
